mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tasks (title, content, start_date, end_date, username, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{username}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE tasks SET title = #{task.title}, content = #{task.content}, start_date = #{task.startDate}, end_date = #{task.endDate}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{task.id} AND username = #{username}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tasks WHERE id = #{id} AND username = #{username}
